query_1.text: How did Taylor Swift's transition from country to pop music influence her commercial success and critical acclaim in the music industry?

query_2.text: In what ways has Ed Sheeran's songwriting and collaboration with other artists contributed to his status as one of the best-selling music artists of all time?

query_3.text: How has Adele Laurie Blue Adkins's emotional songwriting and vocal performances shaped her identity as a leading figure in contemporary pop and soul music?

query_4.text: In what ways has Beyoncé Knowles Carter used her platform to advocate for social justice and women's empowerment throughout her career?

query_5.text: How did Bruno Mars's blend of various musical styles and genres contribute to his unique sound and success in winning multiple Grammy Awards?

query_6.text: In what ways has Lady Gaga's influence on fashion and art intersected with her musical achievements to create a distinct cultural impact?
